name: Alien Battle Attack
description:
Alien Battle Attack is a fun and competitive battle royale game! Compete with other players and UFOs as you try to become the leader of Earth. Hover over buildings, forests and cities and absorb them to make yourself bigger. Then abduct other aliens by hovering over them! Reach first place and win the battle!

Alien Battle Attack features:
• Simple and satisfying gameplay!
• Beautiful, mesmerising graphics!
• Endless gameplay, you'll never get bored!
• No IAPs – Alien Battle Attack is a full game from the moment you download!
